text: 1) It appears your page has all the right meta needed to be a french page.  I'm not sure what you mean that it is showing as "an english page" can you provide a screenshot?

Thanks <@U25PYL3Q8> for answering.

If you check site:<http://ideagency.fr|ideagency.fr>
Then you'll see many referenced pages like 
- Business development thesis
- Brainstorming essay example
- Breast surgery essay - Ideagency
All these "english" pages don't exist on our COS Website Pages
They are all fake. 

So I don't understand how is it possible that Google
has these fakes on their search engine
that is 99% most likely referral spam
they even "create" pages now buy hitting a 404 for some so it looks like you have a page
hold on a oment and I'll get you an article that might help you
Thank you ! I will read this post and hope that it could help me :slightly_smiling_face:
Just a note, it wont' prevent any of those "fake pages" from showing up in your previous analytics.  It will prevent it from showing up in future analytics
yes of course, analytics will be "clean" but these URLs will still be present. So it will not fix the problem but just clean GA. Does HubSpot has recommandations about SPAM attack ?
